<script>
  var map = new GMap2();
  map.setCenter(new GLatLng(39.917, 116.397), 5);
  var url = "http://www.google.com/intl/zh-CN_cn/mapfiles/ms/micons/flag.png";
  GEvent.addListener(map, "click", function(o, point) {
    var myIcon = new GIcon(G_DEFAULT_ICON, url);
    myIcon.iconSize = new GSize(32, 32);
    var marker = new GMarker(point, { icon: myIcon});
    map.addOverlay(marker);
  });

</script>
